item.title: Snow White Is a Box Office Dwarf
item.description: Will Hollywood once again fail to learn from its mistakes?

item.title: The President Can Act Unilaterally to Defend America Abroad
item.description: The Trump administration’s actions against the Houthis are legally grounded in the U.S. Constitution and fully permissible under international law.

item.title: James Burnham’s Divided Legacy
item.description: Both supporters and opponents of aiding Ukraine can find justification for their views in the thought of one of National Review ’s most influential fi...

item.title: Tim Walz Is None of the Things They Said He Was
item.description: The ‘gee shucks’ routine was precisely that: a routine. But what excuse did the press have to play along?

item.title: The Left Doesn’t Want to Moderate on Transgenderism
item.description: Any left-leaning politician who wants to moderate on trans issues will have to do so in defiance of the Left itself.
